001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums.WebElementAction;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.BiFunction;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.Map;
007import lombok.Getter;
008import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException;
009import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
010
011/**
012 * Enum representing exception handling strategies for Selenium WebDriver operations.
013 *
014 * <p>This enum maps specific WebDriver methods to exception handling logic, allowing
015 * for customized recovery strategies when exceptions occur during execution.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public enum ExceptionHandlingWebDriver {
020
021   /**
022    * Handles exceptions for the {@code findElement} method.
023    * When a {@link NoSuchElementException} occurs, a recovery strategy is applied.
024    */
025   FIND_ELEMENT("findElement",
026         Map.of(
027               NoSuchElementException.class,
028               (driver, objects) ->
029                     ExceptionHandlingWebDriverFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(driver,
030                           WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENT, objects)
031         )),
032
033   /**
034    * Handles exceptions for the {@code findElements} method.
035    * When a {@link NoSuchElementException} occurs, a recovery strategy is applied.
036    */
037   FIND_ELEMENTS("findElements",
038         Map.of(
039               NoSuchElementException.class,
040               (driver, objects) ->
041                     ExceptionHandlingWebDriverFunctions.handleNoSuchElement(driver,
042                           WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS, objects)
043         ));
044
045   /**
046    * The name of the WebDriver method associated with this exception handler.
047    */
048   @Getter
049   private final String methodName;
050
051   /**
052    * A map that associates exception types with their corresponding handling strategies.
053    * This allows defining specific behaviors for different exception scenarios.
054    */
055   private final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, BiFunction<WebDriver, Object[], Object>> exceptionHandlingMap;
056
057   /**
058    * Constructs an exception handling configuration for a WebDriver method.
059    *
060    * @param methodName           The name of the WebDriver method.
061    * @param exceptionHandlingMap A map linking exception types to their handling strategies.
062    */
063   ExceptionHandlingWebDriver(final String methodName,
064                              Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, BiFunction<WebDriver,
065                                    Object[], Object>> exceptionHandlingMap) {
066      this.methodName = methodName;
067      this.exceptionHandlingMap = exceptionHandlingMap;
068   }
069
070   public Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, BiFunction<WebDriver, Object[], Object>> getExceptionHandlingMap() {
071      return Collections.unmodifiableMap(exceptionHandlingMap);
072   }
073
074}
